org.grules.ast
[Groovy] Class RulesAstTransformation

java.lang.Object
  org.grules.ast.GrulesAstTransformation
      org.grules.ast.RulesAstTransformation

@GroovyASTTransformation(phase = CompilePhase.CONVERSION)
class RulesAstTransformation
extends GrulesAstTransformation

Transformations of an abstract syntax tree for rules scripts. The main transformations: - wrapping first term of the first subrule into subrules sequence
- substitution of labels with the method call that declares a corresponding group
- substitution of logic operators with binary operators
- lifting error expressions to a subrule level
- wrapping functions calls into closures
- transform "~" operator to a conversion closure
